Reform.origin: [allows a writing signed by mistake to be ed "W. M. McGovern, Jr. et al. "]

1.definition: to put (a writing) into a corrected form that more accurately reflects the agreement of the parties [allows a writing signed by mistake to be"W. M. McGovern, Jr."] compare

2.definition: to induce or cause to abandon wrongful or harmful ways [adrug dealer]to become changed for the better
